sentences.en: But you'd better tidy up your belongings so that the housemaid will do up the room.
sentences.cn: 但你们最好把行李整理好,以便服务员收拾房间.

sentences.en: Certainly, sir. The housemaid will be there right away.
sentences.cn: 当然可以, 先生. 客房服务员马上就到.

sentences.en: He phones the housemaid and reports on the loss.
sentences.cn: 他给服务员打电话报失.

sentences.en: He took me for his housemaid.
sentences.cn: 他把我当作他的女佣人了.
服务员.我可以进来 吗 ?

sentences.en: In the matter of the arrangement of the furniture she never took the housemaid's opinion.
sentences.cn: 在家具布置方面,她和女仆的观点总是相左.

sentences.en: My grandmother used to work below stairs as a housemaid when she was young.
sentences.cn: 我祖母年轻的时候曾当过女佣人.

sentences.en: Our housemaid does everything except ( to ) wash the car.
sentences.cn: 除了 洗刷 汽车之外,我们的女仆人什么都做.

sentences.en: The daily housemaid hoovers the carpet every other day.
sentences.cn: 白天做工的保姆每隔一天用真空吸尘器把地毯弄干净.

sentences.en: The housemaid comes to mop our kitchen floor twice a week.
sentences.cn: 女佣每周两次到我家来拖洗厨房地板.

sentences.en: The housemaid eavesdropped from behind the kitchen door.
The housemaid told me that Yolardis wanted to come in to see me.
sentences.cn: 女佣告诉我尤拉迪丝想要进来见我。

sentences.en: The housemaid wanted like anything to try on her mistress's clothes.
sentences.cn: 那个女仆极想试穿女主人的衣服.

sentences.en: The housemaid who had welcomed Hurstwood had her opinion also.
sentences.cn: 那个给赫斯渥开门的公寓女仆也有看法.

sentences.en: The housemaid will be there right away.
Will you send me a housemaid to pick up the laundry?
sentences.cn: 你能派个服务员来拿送洗的衣物 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: （尤指旧时打扫房屋的）女佣，女仆
trans.tran_en: a female servant who cleans someone’s house
